<style lang="scss">
body{
  margin: 30px;
  background-color: #eeeeee;
}
h1,h2,h3,h4,p{
  margin:0;
}
#app {
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  color: #2c3e50;
}

.sun-grid{
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns:repeat(12, 1fr);
}

.sun-col-4{
  grid-column:span 4;
}
.sun-col-6{
  grid-column:span 6;
}
.sun-col-8{
  grid-column:span 8;
}
.sun-u-txt--left{
  text-align: left;
}
.sun-u-txt--right{
  text-align: right;
}
.sun-wrapper{
  padding:20px;
}

</style>
